Create an interactive online platform where users can design their own experiments and share their results with others.
Develop a mobile app that uses augmented reality technology to simulate scientific experiments in real-time.
Create a series of short films that document the process of conducting scientific experiments, highlighting the challenges and successes along the way.
Develop a game that challenges players to solve complex scientific problems using logic and critical thinking skills.
Host a public science fair where participants showcase their own scientific projects and experiments, and engage in discussions with other scientists and members of the community.
